title: Boom (Canada's Expo 67)
creator_credit: Canadian Broadcasting Corporation and Alain Grothe
brief_description: Shows the rapid expansion of Montreal in the last few years due to the building of Expo 67 in that city. Views of the city are combined with a coverage of the Expo site in the process of construction. Narrated by Lorne Greene.
